text: Mimocalothyrza bottegoi is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Gestro in 1895, originally under the genus Calothyriza. It is known from Tanzania, Kenya, Ethiopia, and Somalia.BioLib.cz - Mimocalothyrza bottegoi. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1895
title: Mimocalothyrza bottegoi
